articles.title: Aldi is selling an electric pressure washer for just $70 – and it's perfect to help get your garden ready for Spring
articles.author: Josh Cain
articles.summary: Aldi has launched the Ferrex Electric Power Washer, a budget-friendly outdoor cleaning gadget, as part of its Aldi Finds lineup for 2025. This new model, priced at $69.99, features a 1600 PSI max pressure, a 1.4 gallons-per-minute output, and replaces the previous Ferrex 1850 PSI model.

articles.title: Preorder the Light Phone III and save $200 (and your sanity)
articles.author: John Alexander
articles.summary: Light Phone is launching the Light Phone III, designed to simplify users' lives intentionally. The phone is available for pre-order now with an estimated shipping date in August, offering a $200 discount.

articles.title: Summer deals are here! Save up to 50% on pool vacuums, sandals, pressure washers
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Amazon is offering discounts on several products, including the Beatbot AquaSense 2 Cordless Robotic Pool Vacuum Cleaner and the Rove R2-4K DUAL Dash Cam Front and Rear. Also on sale are the Greenworks Pro Brushless Electric Pressure Washer and Blink Outdoor 4 Wireless Smart Security Camera, among other summer essentials.

articles.title: Summer deals are here! Save up to 50% on pool vacuums, sandals, pressure washers
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Amazon is offering discounts on various products, including the Beatbot AquaSense 2 Cordless Robotic Pool Vacuum Cleaner, Rove R2-4K DUAL Dash Cam, and Blink Outdoor 4 Wireless Smart Security Camera. Other items include the COOS BAY 11x11 Pop Up Instant Gazebo Tent, KuaiLu Flip Flops for Women, AXV Vibration Plate Fitness Platform, Nutrafol hair growth supplement, Greenworks Pro Brushless Electric Pressure Washer, and Major Fitness Drone1 Power Cage.

articles.title: Ready or Not Launches This Summer for PS5 and Xbox Series X
articles.author: William D'Angelo
articles.summary: Void Interactive will launch Ready or Not, a tactical first-person shooter, for the PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X|S this Summer. The game is currently available for PC via Steam. The console versions will be available in a Standard Edition for $49.99.

articles.title: I was ready to chuck my white trainers in the bin after they went all grubby – until I discovered a 15p trick
articles.author: Kate Kulniece
articles.summary: Rebecca Davison-Lee raved about the new "Stain Remover Soap" online. The soap is made from natural ingredients and sells for £7.99 for 50 uses, costing 15p per use. The brand recommends wetting the fabric first, moistening the soap and rubbing it into the stain. Cleaning fans can order the soap online via the website and choose between a two-pack (£14.39) and a three-pack (£19.18).

articles.title: What's the Switch 2's Price With Tariffs?
articles.summary: Nintendo provided hands-on experiences with its new console, the Switch 2. The price point of the Switch 2 is affected by ongoing tariffs.

articles.title: Food innovation: Three opportunities on the table for New Zealand
articles.author: The Country
articles.summary: Teiny, founded by Emma Arvidson and Renee Tauwhare, launched oat milk-powder. State of Play, New Zealand's first and only zero alcohol brewery, was founded by Grant Caunter. Lewis Road Creamery recently forayed into double cream, with slightly higher fat and better mouthfeel.

articles.title: 'Sneakers look like new': Save your soles with these No. 1 bestselling sponges
articles.summary: SneakErasers, a new product from college roommates-turned-entrepreneurs, are dual-sided, pre-moistened sponges designed for cleaning sneaker soles. Available on Amazon and featured on Shark Tank, these sponges have garnered positive reviews for their effectiveness in removing scuff marks and dirt, restoring sneakers to a like-new condition.

articles.title: What's The Difference Between Light And Dark Soy Sauce?
articles.author: A.J. Forget
articles.summary: Pearl River Bridge offers both Light and Dark Soy Sauces, each suited for different cooking applications. The Light Soy Sauce works well in dishes like honey garlic crispy beef and fried rice, while the Dark Soy Sauce is recommended for stews, braises, and glazes. Kikkoman Soy Sauce is mentioned as a common Japanese soy sauce, but the article distinguishes it from the Pearl River Bridge offerings.

articles.title: Lidl to sell a Dyson vacuum dupe that's £189.99 cheaper than the original
articles.author: Laura Mcguire
articles.summary: Lidl is launching the Silvercrest Cordless Cyclone Vacuum Cleaner as a cheaper alternative to a Dyson vacuum, priced at £59.99. Additionally, Lidl will offer the Beldray REVO Cordless Hand-Held Vacuum Cleaner for £39.99, positioned as a dupe for the Shark Cordless Handheld Vacuum.

articles.title: Lidl to sell a Dyson vacuum dupe that's £189.99 cheaper than the original
articles.author: Laura McGuire
articles.summary: LIDL is launching the Silvercrest Cordless Cyclone Vacuum Cleaner, a Dyson dupe, for £59.99. They are also launching the Beldray REVO Cordless Hand-Held Vacuum Cleaner, a Shark dupe, for £39.99. Both products will be available in stores next Sunday as part of LIDL's "Middle of Lidl" offers.

articles.title: Upgrade your laundry room with these 15 washers and dryers
articles.author: Christopher Murray
articles.summary: The article highlights new washers and dryers from brands like GE, Samsung, Whirlpool, Koolmare, LG, Equator and Insignia. These include models like the GE Profile UltraFresh with SmartDispense, Samsung smart compatible top-load washer with SmartThings app integration, and LG smart top load washer with AI technology. There are also washer/dryer combos such as the Insignia high-efficiency washer dryer combo and the Samsung Bespoke stacked laundry center with AI, focusing on features like capacity, smart functionality, and specialized cycles.

articles.title: 40 years ago, New Coke was introduced
articles.summary: Coca-Cola's "New Coke," a product, is being commemorated by fans as they mark the 40th anniversary of its release on April 23, 1985.

articles.title: 27 Products If Future You Wants To Spend Less Time Cleaning And More Time Living Their Life
articles.author: Jonathan Mazzei
articles.summary: The article presents a list of various cleaning products available on Amazon, each designed to simplify and improve household cleaning tasks.  Featured products include dust sponges, pet hair removers (ChomChom Roller), robo vacuums (Lefant), shower cleaners (Wet & Forget), and specialized cleaning tools like Bottle Bright tablets and the Frywall splatter guard, aiming to reduce cleaning time and effort. The items are available for purchase from retailers like Amazon.

articles.title: Windows 11 Could Make a Much-Needed Change to the Start Menu
articles.author: Josh Hawkins
articles.summary: Microsoft is testing a wider, more flexible Start menu for Windows 11, allowing users to turn off recommendations for apps and files, and offering an option to show all apps directly on the main panel. These changes, currently available to Windows Insiders, aim to improve usability and address user feedback, potentially becoming a key feature in future Windows 11 updates.

articles.title: Taco Bell returns a favorite menu item after hiatus
articles.author: Fernanda Tronco
articles.summary: Taco Bell is relaunching Crispy Chicken Nuggets nationwide starting April 24. The nuggets consist of all-white meat chicken marinated in jalapeño buttermilk and coated in a crunchy tortilla-chip and breadcrumb blend, served with Hidden Valley Fire Ranch Sauce or Jalapeño Honey Mustard. Taco Bell is also considering making Crispy Chicken Nuggets a permanent menu item by 2026.

articles.title: Gwyneth Paltrow Keeps This $19 Facial Mist on Her Vanity
articles.author: Michelle Rostamian
articles.summary: Avène Thermal Spring Water Facial Mist, priced at $19, is available on Amazon. This mist, suitable for all skin types, calms redness and soothes skin with only two ingredients: Avène thermal spring water and nitrogen. The Avène product has garnered over 11,000 five-star reviews on Amazon.

articles.title: I'm increasingly frustrated with Samsung's handling of One UI 7
articles.author: Stephen Radochia
articles.summary: Samsung's One UI 7 software update for Galaxy devices is experiencing significant delays, raising concerns about the company's promise of 7 years of updates, particularly for the Galaxy S24 Ultra. The delays in One UI 7 launch, impacting many Samsung users except those using Galaxy S25 series,  threatens to erode consumer confidence and the company's reputation for reliable software, especially in contrast to previous issues with TouchWiz.

articles.title: SuperGrok Legacy: Elon Musk's xAI May Introduce New Tier for Paid Subscribers With Enhanced Features
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: xAI is potentially launching a new tier called "SuperGrok Legacy" for its SuperGrok service. Microsoft is introducing a new AI-powered Copilot Merchant Program designed to help sellers enhance customer shopping experiences and boost sales.

articles.title: 'Amazing, very powerful' Henry Quick vacuum £110 off on Amazon
articles.author: Rafi Mauro-Benady
articles.summary: The Cordless Henry Vacuum is available at a reduced price on Amazon and Argos, boasting a larger capacity, detachable battery, and lightweight design. The Shark Cordless Handheld Vacuum WV200UK is also highlighted as a versatile cleaning solution for carpets and hard floors, receiving positive customer feedback regarding its power and convenience.

articles.title: The Forgotten Starbucks Drink Size That Needs To Make A Return
articles.author: Erica Martinez
articles.summary: Starbucks previously offered a mini, 10-ounce size of its Frappuccinos, which were tested in 2014 and released on a wider scale in 2015 for a limited time. This smaller size was appealing for trying new Frappuccino flavors and provided a lower-calorie option, but it has not been available since then. Currently Starbucks offers new espresso drink called the Cortado in Short (8 ounces).

articles.title: Crushon AI Delivers Spicy AI Model Creation For NSFW AI Control
articles.summary: Crushon.AI has launched its Model Creation toolkit, empowering users to create customized AI personas for Spicy AI Chat experiences. This new feature offers control over aspects like tone, emotional triggers, memory retention, and visual identity, allowing users to shape characters to fit their preferences.

articles.title: Crushon AI Delivers Spicy AI Model Creation For NSFW AI Control
articles.author: CRUSHON AI INC
articles.summary: Crushon.AI has launched new Spicy AI model generation capabilities, positioning itself as a premier destination for uncensored, user-influenced AI relationship creation. The Model Creation toolkit allows users to create customized AI personas with control over tone, memory, and visual identity. The platform offers features like custom system prompts, long-term memory configuration, and visual asset assignment for creating personalized NSFW AI companions.

articles.title: Next Music Mogul? SZA Launching Beauty Brand
articles.author: King Bee Kiragu
articles.summary: SZA is launching a new beauty brand called "Not Beauty", with a hydrating lip gloss as its first product, available in three shades. The lip gloss is designed to last and moisturize, addressing SZA's personal needs. The product will initially be available in pop-up stores during SZA's Grand National Tour.

articles.title: MAUREEN BURNS: A fishy tale
articles.author: Maureen Burns
articles.summary: Zully and Lou Hamper launched a fresh fish store. This store allows customers to buy fish and soups to go, eat at a table, and learn how to cook fish.

articles.title: Another Cronos: New Dawn Trailer Arrives With Some Gruesome Visuals
articles.author: Technowize Magazine
articles.summary: Bloober Team is launching a new sci-fi horror game called 'Cronos: New Dawn.' A trailer was released showcasing the survival horror's violence and hostility.

articles.title: 'I tried Papa Johns' garlic bath bomb and have important warning for others'
articles.author: Danielle Kate Wroe
articles.summary: Papa Johns launched a garlic-scented bath bomb coinciding with National Garlic Day. According to Adam Wilcock, a spokesperson for Papa Johns, they are confident people will try the product. However, initial impressions suggest a very strong and potentially unpleasant garlic aroma.

articles.title: Zakeke: E-commerce product customization
articles.author: Maziar Foroudian
articles.summary: Zakeke is launching an AI tool designed for e-commerce merchants to provide real-time product customization, 3D visualization, AR, and Virtual Try-Ons. It streamlines the personalization process by automating personalized orders and showcases unlimited product variants digitally for various industries.

articles.title: 'I tried Papa Johns' viral garlic bath bomb and it did something awful to bathroom'
articles.author: Danielle Kate Wroe
articles.summary: Papa John's launched a garlic-scented bath bomb to celebrate National Garlic Day and capitalize on the popularity of their Special Garlic dip. The company's Research & Development Director believes the bath bomb will intrigue customers and provide a lasting garlicky fix. The bath bomb was available for a limited time, until April 20.

articles.title: 25 Target Beauty Products That'll Help With Upkeep Without Costing A Fortune
articles.author: Julia Lynn Rubin
articles.summary: The article highlights several affordable beauty and personal care products available at Target.  Brands like Odele with leave-in detangling tonic, Tangle Teezer detangling brush and ColourPop eyeshadow are featured along with Revlon Kiss Balm. Other brands include E.l.f. waterproof liquid eyeliner, Curology daily moisturizer with SPF 30 sunscreen and Wet n Wild soft blur matte lipstick. Also featured are Garnier Fructis Sleek & Shine hairspray, L.A. Girl pink pro concealer, Good Molecules Yerba Mate wake-up eye gel, Jergens cherry almond moisturizer, Physicians Formula Butter Glow bronzer and blush, Maybelline liquid foundation, Odele smoothing shampoo, and E.l.f. daily cleanser and a curl and volume mascara are showcased for their effectiveness and low price points.

articles.title: Beauty Editor's Picks: The Soft Launch Edition
articles.author: Kannagi Desai
articles.summary: Violette_FR introduced Bisou Jelly in Aïssa, a sheer, glossy lip product. Indē Wild launched Luminary Eye Concentrate, a fast-absorbing eye product. Dyson released Pre-style Cream with Chitosan, a pre-styling cream that helps hair behave.

articles.title: OPPO unveils new phone with underwater photography technology
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: OPPO unveiled its new A5 Pro flagship phone. The phone has capacity to withstand severe temperature, abnormal erosion, slam shock and water and features underwater photography technology.

articles.title: I tried an affordable Motorola smartphone with a stylus, and it surprised me
articles.author: Anuj Bhatia
articles.summary: Motorola recently launched the Edge 60 Stylus, a budget-friendly smartphone featuring a built-in stylus. The phone has a 6.7-inch display, a mid-tier Qualcomm Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 processor, and a 50-megapixel main camera. The stylus elevates the usability of the smartphone.

articles.title: Free Google Features on All Samsung Phones
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Google has launched its Astra AI assistant for free to all Android mobile phone users. Astra, a feature of 'GE interactive Aimini Live', enables real-time screen and camera sharing with the AI for problem-solving and information retrieval. Users can download the 'GE app' — 'Gemini' — from the Galaxyplay Store to access Astra.

articles.title: Why I pre-ordered a Nintendo Switch 2 despite the outdated tech
articles.summary: Nintendo is releasing the Nintendo Switch 2, bundled with Mario Kart World and other new first-party games like Metroid Prime 4 and Donkey Kong Bananza.  The console is priced at £395 separately or £429 when bundled with Mario Kart World, and the reader pre-ordered it due to upcoming games including a collaboration with FromSoftware called The Duskbloods.

articles.title: Why I pre-ordered a Nintendo Switch 2 despite the outdated tech - Reader's Feature
articles.author: Game Central
articles.summary: Nintendo is launching the Nintendo Switch 2 on June 5, with a price of £395 separately and £429 bundled with Mario Kart World. The launch event also unveiled new first-party games for the console.

articles.title: Garmin Vivoactive 6 Review: Reliable, Real Intelligence
articles.author: Wired
articles.summary: Garmin has launched a new subscription service alongside its latest entry-level tracker, which is noted for its reliability and functionality.

articles.title: Shoulder pads are back! And this time they're detachable
articles.author: The Times/The Sunday Times
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer is introducing shoulder pads. They previously soft-launched them in black in December, and they mostly sold out.

articles.title: New Pokemon Scarlet and Violet Code Gets You A Free Generation 8 Pokemon
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Pokemon Scarlet and Violet introduced a new code distribution event, allowing players to obtain in-game items.

articles.title: Don't give your email to strangers, use a decoy address instead
articles.summary: DuckDuckGo, Mozilla with Firefox Relay, FastMail, Addy.io, Proton Mail with SimpleLogin service, and Apple with iCloud+ offer email masking services. These services provide randomized email addresses to protect user privacy by relaying messages and blocking unwanted emails. The services can be used to protect against data leaks, unauthorized information sharing, and spam.

articles.title: New Business: Tesla quietly opens in Londonderry; Asian Thai Kitchen takes over seafood joint in Milford
articles.author: Jonathan Phelps
articles.summary: Tesla has opened a dealership and service center in Londonderry featuring the Model 3 sedan and Model Y compact crossover. Warby Parker will have the grand opening of new location and feature the brand's full optical and sunglass assortment, including the new Summer 2025 collection. O'Neil Cinemas is set to reopen in July with luxurious seating, enhanced amenities, and a new restaurant and bar called Backstage Lounge.

articles.title: 'I tried Papa Johns' garlic bath bomb and have important warning for others'
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: Papa Johns launched a garlic-scented bath bomb. The launch has been labeled as 'unhinged' by fans.

articles.title: Next Official Life-Sized Pokemon Plush is a Gen 1 Favorite
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: The Pokemon Company has revealed a new life-sized Pokemon plush. This plush will be a part of The Pokemon Company's existing collection of Pokemon plushes.

articles.title: PowerWash Simulator 2 Trailer Details Modes, Improvements, and More
articles.author: Gaming Bolt
articles.summary: FuturLab announced PowerWash Simulator 2, a sequel to their previous game. A new trailer was released, revealing gameplay footage and tidbits about the upcoming game.
